channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Luxury's Last Growth Engine Has Stalled
item.description: A sudden slowdown in Chinese demand reported by Louis Vuitton’s owner is a bad sign for the luxury industry.

item.title: These 5 portfolio stocks outperformed the market's incredible run since our September Monthly Meeting
item.description: The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average hit records as investors celebrate the Federal Reserve's pivot to its rate-cutting era.

item.title: A Librarian Hopes to Retire at 55 and Travel. Can She Afford It?
item.description: A financial adviser suggests she increase her contributions to a retirement account—by a lot.

item.title: Dollar Strengthens As Inflation Cools In Developed Economies
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index rose as the greenback gained against the pound and euro amid signs of cooling prices in the U.K and New Zealand.

item.title: ASML just gave us a first glimpse into how U.S. chip export curbs will dent its China sales
item.description: ASML on Tuesday offered the first glimpse into how U.S. restrictions on exports of its advanced chip manufacturing tools to China will impact its sale...

item.title: Gold Futures Rise as Treasuries Fall Ahead of U.S. Economic Data
item.description: Gold futures rose, holding close to all-time highs and benefiting from falling U.S. Treasury yields ahead of key economic data.

item.title: Stocks Flat as Morgan Stanley Gains on Strong Earnings
item.description: Major U.S. stock markets were little changed as bank earnings add to evidence the economy is heading toward a soft landing.

item.title: Embattled Abbott Labs comes through with a strong quarter, buyback announcement
item.description: Abbott Labs delivered for investors who stuck with the stock despite legal woes that emerged earlier this year.

item.title: Morgan Stanley shares pop 7% after beating estimates for third quarter profit and revenue
item.description: Morgan Stanley has several tail winds in its favor, from high stock values to a rebound in investment banking and strong trading activity.

item.title: We're raising our Morgan Stanley price target after a post-earnings stock surge to record highs
item.description: Morgan Stanley's third-quarter beat on the top and bottom lines, with strength seen across the board.
